Can we use Ant 1.7 with junit4 to create test reports. I am able to execute
my junit 3.8 tests with ANT 1.7, and reports also get created properly. but
the moment I use junit 4.4 , it starts throwing error. I searched on net,
and got a feeling that may be ant 1.7 is not fully compatible with junit4...
Is it true ?

Best,
Pranav
